scene.title: 序2
scene.text: The boy bowed, then turned his back and headed down the mountain. Lin Zhaoyu watched her pupil disappear toward a stone staircase before turning to face Su Mei in silence
scene.dialog: 「I think of you as a younger sister apprentice, but there's no right to interfere with my Taixuan school.」
「I'm sorry.」
scene.text: Still smiling, Su Mei turned her gaze far away and then looked around this small room again.
scene.dialog: 「The Taixuan Faction, the Kumokan... Heheh. They're all yours now!」
scene.text: Lin Zhaoyu responded coldly with a snort of “Hmph.”
scene.dialog: 「Either way, the Taixuan family must be informed. I can't allow them to break off with my own hands!」
「*sigh* Of the seven of us, Miss Zhaoyu seems to miss her most.」
scene.text: The two of them continued their small talk, never getting down to business. Lin Zhaoyu patiently waited for him but Su Mei seemed interested in the little things
scene.dialog: 「Miss Zhaoyu's pupil has quite a bit of potential, and she does have some nerve. It is just too bad that he was male; it will be difficult to train Little Ma into her own level」

「...When I take apprentices, my talent is not as important to me. And Yanqing has enough martial arts skills that no one can compete with him in the first place! Men and women don't matter—not even a single disciple of mine could match his」
「But Zhenyus certainly do have a knack for it. The Void Faction will be passed on to future generations eventually, and he might become my last disciple!」
「Miss Zhaoyu, are you thinking about your last apprentice now?」

motion.img: 林朝雨-心头一震-标准-中景

scene.text: Lin Zhaoyu was somewhat dumbfounded, and suddenly went pale.

She was the oldest of Phoenix’s seven disciples, and fifteen years older than her second[\s]Lin Zhaoyu hadn’t bothered him at first, but now that years have passed and he is married to the youngest Ma Feima has made his age even more apparent
scene.dialog: 「Su Mei, stop trying to test my patience... Let's get back on topic.」
scene.text: The head of the Taixuan Faction would break through their groping each other's stomach.
scene.dialog: 「Master resurrected, sister apprentice dead. Now it's our turn—what are you going to do?[\s]You didn't come to see me for the first time in a long while just so we could chat, right? Are you... planning on killing my master again.」
scene.text: Lin Zhaoyu took her younger sister apprentice’s silence as an affirmation.
scene.dialog: 「I don't like you, Su Mei. But in the past she thought of me as her own little sister... So let’s give some advice to that effect:」
「It's different now. The seven of us will never be together again, and we were just lucky back then... There is no guarantee that it would turn out the same even if I tried one more time」
scene.text: Lin Zhaoyu let out a long sigh.

motion.img: 林朝雨-心头一震-标准-中景

dialog.p: 「It's been twenty years, but I never forgot that night...
Wanxi and Lingshuang nearly lost their lives. If it weren't for you, that sword with the face of Yanqingru would have been a disaster...」

scene.dialog: 「You really do miss the past, don't you? Heheh. It has been twenty years already! 『If...』 is nothing like that...」

text.p: Su Mei had absolutely no interest in the past.
Lin Zhaoyu understood, but she couldn't agree with him at all.

scene.dialog: 「Hmph, tell me. What's your plan?」
「I don't have a plan.」
scene.text: In the martial arts world, everyone acknowledged that she was intelligent and earned her nickname of 『Chikei Musou』—Su Mei. That’s what he said
scene.dialog: 「No matter how hard you think about it, there's no plan that will work out perfectly. If everything goes according to your plans then Master should be dead by now and he won’t come back into this world...」
「That's why I have no intention of making any plans. Change happens all the time, and it is impossible to calculate a human heart...」
scene.text: Something cold suddenly welled up in the hearts of Lin Zhaoyu.
He hated Su Mei, but on the inside he believed she must have had some kind of plan.

Just like twenty years ago, when she gathered seven people and plotted to kill Phoenix—the invincible True Celestial. —The world would change with time; I knew that but the Taixuana Seven Swords had also changed from before
scene.dialog: 「So, you...」
「Yeah, I don't have a plan. But there are plenty of ways to do it!」
scene.text: Lin Zhaoyu frowned suspiciously.
scene.dialog: 「A way?」
「Yes.」

dialog.p: 「Twenty years ago, we buried our master and set fire to Mount Taixuan.
After that, I went back to the mountains and found something suspicious.」

scene.dialog: 「Master's sword was missing.」
scene.text: Su Mei takes a step forward. There seems to be an even deeper meaning behind her gaze as she stares at the Lin Zhaoyu
scene.dialog: 「...It was gone?」
scene.text: Su Mei was staring at Lin Zhaoyu’s face, but she suddenly averted her gaze.
scene.dialog: 「...It's not my sister.」
「Huh?」
scene.text: Su Mei smiled faintly on her face, as if she had come up with something interesting.
scene.dialog: 「By the time I returned, Master's coffin had been burned to a crisp. The bones inside it were scorched and there was no sign of them at all! Unfortunately for you—I decided on where they should be —because in that place we thought fire would never pass us by」
「That's why I investigated the crime scene. Then, as expected...」
「The body inside the coffin didn't belong to my master.」
「...What did you say?」

dialog.p: 「In other words... You've known Master was alive for a long time? Did you know that twenty years ago, dearest Mell.
And yet, she didn't tell me... She said nothing and kept quiet.」
「I didn't know. Never knew... What about Lord Yanqing? Do you not understand the situation either, Wanxi and Wanru ...
Besides, Suyi. At the very least I have to let her know―」

scene.dialog: 「No, I didn't tell anyone.」
scene.text: Lin Zhaoyu steps back. Suddenly, a sharp pain runs through her cheeks as the old man crushes his pride of being an imaginary sword-fighting leader and makes it seem like she'll be ten years older in no time at all—time is eradicating any deception that might come to mind for him

dialog.p: 「I've lived in solitude for the rest of my life. She is not like us, and we are making preparations... But either way—I cannot afford to let her know about this
Why did you not tell us, Su Mei?」

scene.dialog: 「That's right... I wonder why?」
scene.text: Su Mei mutters. There seems to be a fog in her eyes

The words come out of his mouth in a daze. Su Mei looks around as if she's upset, like an old man who has lost all memory and is searching for some treasure he doesn’t even know himself about from within the piled-up relic
scene.dialog: 「It's just... I need a little more time.」
scene.text: She closes her eyes as she says that. It seems like this is the end of a topic for us to talk about, huh?[\s]When she opened her mouth again, the illusion of an old man had vanished. Standing before Lin Zhaoyu was none other than a calm master at Musoumon Gate
scene.dialog: 「That's right... I knew it for a long time. Twenty years ago, my master disappeared from Mount Taixuan—someone might have stolen his body and he may already be resurrected — so there was no way you could tell? It just occurred to me that one 『Possible.』 existed」
「Master isn't dead, he might be alive.」

dialog.p: 「No matter how unbelievable it may be, as long as there's a possibility I can’t ignore them.[\s]
That's why I created the Muso Gate and sent them all across Zhongyuan. They not only defeated evil spirits, but also gave me missions to locate my master in search of suspicious locations」
For the past few years, Master and I have been trying to find out more about this sword. We've learned a lot from it![\s]
I don't have any proof that we can win, but there are plenty of ways to use it.」

scene.text: 『Means』... Those words made Lin Zhaoyu feel a little uncomfortable.

motion.img: 林朝雨-心头一震-标准-近景

scene.dialog: 「You mustn't do anything dirty to your master. He is Phoenix, after all!」
「Yes... I have no intention of being rude to my master.」
scene.text: A faint smile appeared on Su Mei’s lips, but there was sadness mixed in.
scene.dialog: 「If my master is coming to kill me, then that’s only natural. Those who are killed have the right of vengeance」
「But I don't regret killing my master. If not for that, we would still be in endless agony right now... What about you?」
scene.text: The thirty years they’d spent together had become a thin needle, lightly stabbing into the chest of this headwoman who belonged to the Taixuan faction
scene.dialog: 「...I don't regret it either.」
scene.text: Lin Zhaoyu spoke in a quiet voice.

dialog.p: 「It's fine. I have no intention of sitting down and waiting for death, so from now on we will fight my master with all our might! Only God knows if he is alive or dead—[\s]
That's why I came here. Miss Zhaoyu, please lend me your strength!」

text.p: Lin Zhaoyu stared at the red-haired woman in front of her.[\s]
In the past, she had been her own little sister and best friend. She was a comrade in love with him; he thought that once they parted ways there would be nothing to do between them until their deaths

scene.text: But right now, various emotions swirled in the hearts of Lin Zhaoyu.
And then, at the end of her sentence...

motion.img: 林朝雨-心头一震-标准-近景

scene.dialog: 「Go ahead and say it.」
scene.text: Su Mei stepped out of the cloud view and spread her arms wide at a peak in Tianqiu Peak, drawing circles as she answered.
scene.dialog: 「I want to have Zhaoyu Nee-san's sword style.」
